name: Viking Heroes 5
description:
HISTORY:

Embark on a festive journey as Everand, Brunnhilde, Helga, and Boromere prepare for Yule! Amidst enchanting festivities, the Viking siblings discover Odin has lost control over his vision of time and the threads of fate, prompting a mysterious journey throughout the famous realms of the nine worlds.



It is up to you to help the vikings rediscover the lost Rune of Balance to restore order to the nine worlds. The vikings will have to confront mystical challenges and unveil the truth of their surroundings. They will battle powerful adversaries and team with old and new companions alike. Though not all may be as they seem.



Download now to guide the Viking heroes through illusions, confront powerful adversaries, and claim Odin's extraordinary gifts, shaping their legendary fate!



GAME FEATURES:

In Viking heroes 5, as in any time manager you have to accurately calculate the time for building, collecting resources and timely use of bonuses.

The game has a large variety of buildings and unique items, collecting them you will perform tasks and participate in unique adventures.



Viking heroe 5 is a classic time manger with base building and level resource gathering. To perform at your best, you need to time and give strategic orders to your characters. Each level can be completed for 3 stars, for this you need to complete all tasks as quickly as possible in the timer. The game has 60 elaborate levels and 3 difficulties.

60 exciting levels
5 levels with mini-game
Step-by-step level guide
Catchy downloadable Original Soundtrack
Beautiful desktop wallpapers
A collection of God's gifts

Achievements
